import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { api_votePost } from '../API-calls' import { UPVOTE_POST, DOWNVOTE_POST, DELETE_POST, UPDATE_POST } from '../actions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Vote from './Vote' export default function Post({ post, id }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleClick = (action) => { switch(action){ case 'upVote': dispatch({type: UPVOTE_POST, id}) break case 'downVote': dispatch({type: DOWNVOTE_POST, id}) break case 'delete': dispatch({type: DELETE_POST, id}) default: break } } return ( <> {post.deleted === false ?

  • {post.title}

    {post.body}

    link
    • : '' } ) }
